Sentencas: A microfocused synchrotron x-ray diffraction method was used to reveal the quantitative distributions of phase fractions, internal strains, and their interdependences at different layer depths inside of a planar solid oxide fuel cell, which was deactivated by chromium contamination through direct contact with the metallic interconnect under typical operating conditions.
Titulo: Phase and strain distributions associated with reactive contaminants inside of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: These observations provide insight into the mechanism of Cr poisoning.
Titulo: Phase and strain distributions associated with reactive contaminants inside of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The method can serve as a versatile tool for studying the electrochemical devices with thin-layered construction such as batteries and fuel cells under static or in situ conditions.
Titulo: Phase and strain distributions associated with reactive contaminants inside of a solid oxide fuel cell
